pages.text: The Chroma Shard is a basic item in the mod, used to make most of the other items. It can be found in a majority of both vanilla and modded loot chests.
The Essence of Ascension is used to convert your standard arsenal into Super Curios.

Spicy Coal is an item rarely found in ruined portal chests. It can be used to smelt a lot of items in a furnace, or can be combined with Netherite Scrap to create Magmatic Scrap, a crafting material. Can be melted into Blazing Blood if Tinkers Construct is installed.
